name: Twisted Weapons
description:
Plunder through a dungeon with crazy weapons in your hands that are comprised of fantastic modifications. A bit "FPS", a bit "Card game", a bit "Rogue-lite".

Collect your loot after clearing a room, then modify your weapon's stocks, grips, muzzles, scopes and magazines with the parts that you picked up, each giving your weapon crazy powers.
Each type of weapon has it's own unique playstyle, for example how about putting a part that sets your enemy on fire with 5% chance per every bullet..on a shotgun that shoots 8 pellets per shot. With three guns in your pockets wield your perfect stack of kill-tools!

(Current screenshots and trailer are from the work in progress alpha version.)
